pageContext.claim: “Democrats also support the insane policy of catch-and-release, which has created our border crisis, our certainly helped. A Democrat victory on Election Day would be a bright flashing invitation to traffickers, smugglers, drug dealers, and gang members all over the world, come on in.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a misleading description of catch and release. It mostly applies to children and refugees seeking asylum. Those with criminal records are not eligible for asylum or release. Of the asylum applicants who are released while their cases are pending in immigration courts, more than two-thirds of those people show up for their court dates, according to the Center for Immigration Studies, although some do not and remain in the country without authorization.
